feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: He was ready to curse the day on which he had come to Middlemarch.

causedBy.name: Feeling stigmatized and misunderstood by the town

feels.name: Defiance
feels.quote: He resolved not to shrink from showing his sense of obligation to Bulstrode.

causedBy.name: Decision to face the situation with defiance

feels.name: Resentment
feels.quote: He was setting his mind on remaining in Middlemarch in spite of the worst that could be done against him.

causedBy.name: Decision to stay in Middlemarch despite the town's opinion

feels.name: Pity
feels.quote: Women who were intimate with her talked much of 'poor Harriet,' imagined what her feelings must be, and conjectured how much she had already come to know.

feels.name: Criticism
feels.quote: Rosamond was more severely criticized and less pitied.

causedBy.name: Being associated with her husband's situation
